question: We suppose that Reserve Bank of India would like to increase the cash Reserves of the commercial Banks. Which among the following would be most appropriate action of the RBI to achieve this aim?
option1: RBI would release gold from its reserves
option2: RBI would raise the reserve ratio
option3: RBI would buy the bonds in the open market
option4: RBI will stop the transactions which involve the bills of exchange
answer: RBI would buy the bonds in the open market
